name: closefriend
text: Given how good Onstad is at juxtaposing images to form a larger image, I wish he'd do stuff like this more often in the strip. This means you, Onstad!

name: fuckyoufriday
text: My wife's about to have a baby! I'd better drink 12 beers.

name: spinynorman
text: That there dog has a drankins problem.

name: professorhazard
text: It had a drankins problem on the couch.

name: varnish
text: That is the default expression of any dachshund.

name: gmm
text: On second viewing, that car is OBVIOUSLY orange. Me 1 Month Ago is an idiot .

name: mugi
text: Maybe it's the Volvo of Despair?

name: woodenteeth
text: It is a Volvo. Approximately late 70s. I drove one of these when my parents were done with it. I called it The Ox. It was fucking terrible.

name: unsentletter
text: I love the disembodied Ray face under the "heh! oh my god!..." panel.

name: direhaggis
text:
Y'know Ray's being real happy or hell of such as sad sound similar:

"A doo-da doo da doo-da doo!" - This strip.

"A BLOO BAH BLOOO! A BLOO BLOO BLOOOOOOO!" - 05/23/2005

name: mangtastic
text:
That dog is simply precious !

Also, the dog maybe possibly supplied the dog poo that Ray stepped in? He/she DOES look kind of guilty.

name: akadriver
text:
With this strip, I have now read every single Achewood. This strip is, apparently, one of the lowest-rated, least-commented, and least-viewed strips.

I gave it a pity-4.

name: atticusonline
text: It's a vacation strip, what do you expect?

name: brown
text: I found very interesting information HP0-S26 in it and it is really helpful i think people should HP0-Y23 look forward to it this is really nice work done and i will refer other people to check it out JN0-331 nice work done.keep it up.i will come back here to see more updates in future JN0-350 as well.my best wishes for you always so keep it up.regards
